name: Bipole V: Dungeons of Biphero
description:
[Note: This game is currently in an early development state]

A NEW ADVENTURE IN THE BIPOLE RETRO UNIVERSE!

A modern adaptation of the Bipole Retro lore, now presented as an accessible 3D dungeon crawler requiring no knowledge of the previous 34 Lemniscate entries.

SIMPLE-TO-LEARN GAMEPLAY WITH COMPLEX DEPTH

Explore dungeons with simple turn-based combat, with a strong emphasis on exploiting enemy weaknesses and status effects. Switch out character equipment to prepare for any fight.

At the end of every battle, local economies will progress: shifting the buying and selling prices for every town in semi-random patterns. Buy items during low economies and sell loot during high economies!
